mapper.insert: insert into position (id, position_name, rank, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update position set position_name = #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, position_name, rank, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from position where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, position_name, rank, remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from position where del_flg='0'
select id, position_name,rank,remark, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from POSITION where del_flg = 0
select count(1) from POSITION where position_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
